hints.content:
30: :label: assume-uniform-qsd
31: 
32: At quasi-stationary distribution (QSD) in the thermodynamic limit, the walker density is spatially uniform:
33: 
34: $$
35: \rho_{\text{QSD}}(x) = \rho_0 = \frac{N}{V} = \text{constant}
36: 
37: $$
38: 
39: where:
40: - $N$: Number of alive walkers

33:
